question: Burhan III came to the throne of Ahmednagar in which of the following years?
explanation:
Malik Ambar installed Burhan III on the throne in 1610 CE. Thereafter Malik Ambar continued his attacks on Bijapur and Golconda although he submitted to prince Khurrarn in 1617 CE; and in 1621 CE he gave back the territories conquered
from the Mughals.
